verbose_text: In turn, TGFalpha and AREG, via EGFR signaling, suppressed the Hippo pathway and activated YAP protein (dephosphorylated LATS1, MOB1, and YAP1) to promote cervical cancer cell growth.
evidence: AREG, via EGFR signaling, suppressed the Hippo pathway and activated YAP protein (dephosphorylated LATS1, MOB1, and YAP1) to promote cervical cancer cell growth
